Fly, Stay & Cruise Hawaii | Norwegian Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Fly, Stay & Cruise Hawaii 11 Nights | Honolulu Roundtrip Includes Free at Sea™ benefits Deal Details Travel Dates 05 Mar 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $9,195 per person Enquire Now Includes Free at Sea™ benefits Description Discover the ultimate way to experience the beauty and spirit of Hawai‘i with this all-in-one 11-night Fly, Stay & Cruise package. Your journey begins with return flights to Honolulu, where you’ll enjoy 2 nights pre-cruise in a hotel near vibrant Waikīkī Beach. Soak up the sun, visit Pearl Harbor, or simply relax into island life before your cruise adventure begins. Then, step aboard Pride of America—the only ship sailing round-trip from Honolulu year-round—for a spectacular 7-night cruise through the Hawaiian Islands. Explore a different island each day, from the lush valleys of Kaua‘i, to the volcanic landscapes of the Big Island, and the golden beaches of Maui and O‘ahu. With overnight stays in both Maui and Kaua‘i, you'll have extra time to fully immerse yourself in the local culture, nature, and cuisine. After your cruise, return to Honolulu for 2 more nights post-cruise, giving you the perfect opportunity to relax, reflect, and enjoy a few more sunsets in paradise before flying home. Pricing 11 nights Fly, Stay & Cruise Package to Hawaii from $9,195* per person twin share Cruise departs 7 March 2026 from Honolulu. Price based on Cat BF Stateroom What's Included · Return economy Class Airfares to Honolulu flying Hawaiian Airlines from Auckland · TWO nights pre cruise stay in Honolulu at 4 Star Outrigger Waikiki Beachcomber in a Waikiki View Room including a Waived daily resort fee! · 7 night Inter Island Hawaii Cruise from Honolulu return onboard Pride of America in a Balcony Stateroom · TWO nights post cruise stay in Honolulu at 4 Star Outrigger Waikiki Beachcomber in a Waikiki View Room including a Waived daily resort fee! · Cruise Departs 07 March 2026 · Cruise Itinerary: Honolulu (Oahu), Kahului (Maui), Hilo, Kona (Hawaii), Nawiliwili (Kaua’i) & Honolulu (Oahu). Cruise Inclusions: · Main meals & entertainment onboard your cruise · Specialty Dining package · Shore Excursion Credit & Wi-Fi package on your cruise · Government & Port taxes Free at Sea TM Hawaii Package · Unlimited craft cocktails · Vero Water unlimited refills (excluding bottle) · Soft drinks, soda and juices · Specialty Tostao Colombian coffee while dining · Premium regional spirits brands like Mahina rum, Pau Maui vodka, Fid Street HAW’s gin and More! · Wines by the glass from around the world · Wide varietal of regional beers like Kona Big Wave, Kona Castaway IPA, Kona Fire Rock Pale Ale and More! Itinerary Day 1 - Honolulu The big, blue Pacific and stunning Koolau mountains serve as a dramatic setting for Hawaii's largest city. Climb to the top of Diamond Head. Take a romantic sunset stroll on Waikiki Beach. Catch a glimpse of history by visiting Pearl Harbor and the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific. Day 2 - Honolulu Day 3 - Honolulu Day 4 - Kahului A surplus of natural splendor and the genuine hospitality of its people have helped to make Maui Hawaii's second most popular island. Explore the fascinating history of the town of Lahaina. Plant yourself on a pristine beach, or play one of the world's most beautiful golf courses. Day 5 - Kahlului Day 6 - Hilo The entire city of Hilo is like one giant greenhouse with spectacular tropical flowers at every turn. Visit the town's well-preserved historic buildings, which date back to the turn of the century and showcase Hawaii's unique architecture. Just 30 miles away the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park is the home of the active Kilauea Volcano. Day 7 - Kona Kona offers the quintessential Hawaii experience. Sunny, warm weather and crystal blue waters entice visitors to partake in a variety of surfside fun. Snorkel amongst a kaleidoscope of tropical marine life. Take a surfing lesson, a kayaking trip or head out to deeper waters for some deep-sea fishing Day 8 -Nawiliwili, Kaua'i Named after the Wiliwili trees, which once lined its picturesque harbour, this lovely port of Kaua`i is your gateway to what many believe to be Hawaii's most beautiful island. On "The Garden Island," nature is truly the star, from the dramatic mountains of Kokee to the cool rainforests of Haena. And the tradition of the luau adds lively entertainment unique to Hawaii Day 9 - Nawiliwili, Kaua'i Day 10 - Honolulu (Disembark) Day 11 - Honolulu Your Ship As the only cruise ship sailing year-round from Honolulu, Pride of America® offers the ultimate way to explore the Hawaiian Islands—four islands in seven days, with no sea days in between. That means more time ashore, more cultural experiences, and more unforgettable moments in paradise. On board, say aloha to total relaxation with hot tubs, saunas, and the award-winning Mandara Spa®. Cool off in the pool, take a scenic jog on the outdoor track, or join a friendly game of volleyball as the islands drift by. After a day of adventure, unwind with a Mai Tai at Waikiki Bar, or discover one of the ship’s many unique lounges and entertainment venues. From luxurious Suites and Family Balconies to Solo Studios, there’s a stateroom to match every style of traveler. With Hawaiian-inspired décor and warm service, Pride of America is more than just a cruise—it’s your floating island resort. Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 05 November 2025. Valid for sales based on cruise offer to 30 November 2025. Airfares are based on economy class Hawaiian Airlines. Departing Auckland 05 Mar direct to HNL dep 2330 / K Class KLFIODMZ/ Return departing 16 Mar direct from HNL / K Class KLFIODMZ. NCL Cruise Valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. NCL'S FREE AT SEA ™: Valid on 2+ night sailings offer is capacity controlled. Guests must be 21 years of age at time of sailing to purchase any alcoholic package and to consume alcohol. Specialty dining package: applicable to guests 1-2 on the reservation and varies by cruise duration. Wi-Fi Package: Internet access of 150 minutes of high-speed Wi-Fi powered by Starlink. Provides 1 login per guest that can be used on 1 device at a time. Applicable to all guests in the stateroom. Shore excursion credit: Offer applies to first guest on cruise reservation. The first guest will receive free shore excursion credit valued at US$50 per port. Additional terms and conditions may apply. Ships' registry: BAHAMAS and UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. ©2024 NCL Corporation Ltd Further T&Cs may apply. Some cruise staterooms are based on a 'guarantee' stateroom. The exact stateroom grade, number and location on the ship will be allocated at the discretion of the cruise line. Some staterooms have obstructed views. Subject to availability & change.
